name: Aganorsa Leaf - La Validacion - Habano - Gran Robusto
additionalNotes: Handmade in Nicaragua, the Aganorsa Leaf Validacion Habano Gran Robusto undergoes a rigorous quality control process before the cigars are finally release. They call it “validacion,” which is Spanish for validation or validating. A medium strength cigar with notes of spice, earth and pepper forms a mesmerizing smoking experience. This Nicaraguan puro sports a Habano wrapper stuffed with Corojo and Criollo 98 tobacco.
